domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

text: @richardhorton1 +Is enough being done to "cocoon" those more vulnerable of serious illness from #Coronavirus #Covid19?  Those not in hospitals or care homes?  Surely people with difficulty breathing from preexisting heart/lung conditions are vulnerable eg, at supermarkets, GPs+chemists meanwhile
